name: Praetorian Group
tag_list: law-enforcement, fire-rescue, ems, homeland-security, public-safety, online-training, video, mobile, product-research
overview:
The Praetorian Group has become the leading online media company in the public safety market by bringing Internet technologies to first responders across the nation and beyond. Founded in 1999, Praetorian owns and operates www.PoliceOne.com, www.FireRescue1.com, www.EMS1.com, www.CorrectionsOne.com and www.Homeland1.com as well as a number of micro sites focusing on niche areas of each market, including firefighter rehabilitation, first responder grants, and volunteer firefighting.

In addition, Praetorian trains more than 8,000 officers each year in person through the Calibre Press Street Survival Seminar, the most respected officer safety training program nationwide.

In total, Praetorian operates 19 websites that reach 1.5 million unique visitors each month, and count 500,000 police officers, firefighters, corrections officers, EMTs, paramedics and other public safety professionals as members—a significant percentage of the overall U.S. first responder population.

For 10 years now, Praetorian’s mission has been to provide resources and cutting-edge information that help first responders stay safer, become better informed and more effectively protect their communities. We have addressed this mission by taking mainstream internet technology and intelligently tailoring it to fit the very specialized needs of the public safety community. Although public safety is not comprised of early-adopters, first responders are hungry for information and training resources. Armed with a decades worth of experience, Praetorian has led the adoption of online applications into the day-to-day routines of first responders everywhere.
